abstracts.cdata!:
The higher level objective of the
            project is to promote economic, social, and environmentally
            sustainable development through the implementation of an
            integrated water resources management system. This
            restructuring paper makes the following changes to the
            project: a) extension of 14 months for closing date, from
            November 30, 2012 to March 31, 2014; b) reallocation of loan
            proceeds among its categories; and c) adjustment of project
            targets and indicators to ensure that these are measurable
            within the timeframe for completion and in line with the
            priority activities being supported by the project. The main
            reasons for these changes are: 1) delays in start up and
            implementation of activities; 2) changes in the state
            government administration resulting in major changes in the
            implementing agency teams; 3) exchange rate losses; 4)
            increase in project costs due to the gap between preparation
            and implementation and to the heating of the Brazilian
            market caused by investment programs launched by the Federal
            government; and 5) need for better alignment of activities
            prioritized within the scope of the project to the amount of
            available funding.
